), take 15 south and cross the canal near Brewers Mills (any of Burnt Hills Road, CR12 - Sunbury Road or Washburn Road join Hwy 15 to CR 11 - Battersea Road). While the Battersea Road itself continues north to end at Highway 15, this becomes a winding road and progressively more difficult as one continues north through Frontenac County.

This is a large rural area with small villages, most or all of which are only reachable by motorcar. Greyhound does operate daily Voyageur bus service with limited stops on Highway 15 to link Kingston to
, but there's no bus on the west side of the canal.
